message: I propose a 90/10 split, with me taking the larger share. I'm willing to negotiate if you have a better idea.
Let's split the money more fairly. I propose 55/45, recognizing that we both have equal standing in this decision.  I'm open to discussion, but I believe this is a fair starting point.
I'm willing to compromise and propose a 60/40 split in my favor.  This reflects the value decrease due to inflation.  Let's reach an agreement before the money loses even more value.
